text: Xindao de renmen a! Nimen bici jian chengli dingqi jiedai de shihou, nimen yingdang xie yi zhang jie quan, qing yige hui xie zi de ren, binggong dai xie. Daishu ren bude jujue, dang zunzhao zhen zhu suo jiao ta de fangfa er shuxie. You zhaiwu zhe koushou,(ta koushou shi), dang jingwei zhen zhu ──ta de zhu ──buyao jianshao zhai e yi sihao. Ruguo zhaiwu zhe shi yuchun de, huo lao ruo de, huo buneng qinzi koushou de, namo, jiao ta de jianhuren binggong di ti ta koushou. Nimen dang cong nimen de nanren zhong yaoqing liang ge ren zuo zheng; ruguo meiyou liang ge nanren, namo, cong nimen suo renke de zhengren zhong qing yige nanren he liang ge nuren zuo zheng. Zhege nuren yiwang de shihou, nage nuren keyi tixing ta. Zhengren bei yaoqing de shihou, bude jujue. Wulun zhai e duogua, bu ke yanfan
